casebody.data:
In the Matter of Frank BAILEY et al., Petitioners. No. 4170 Original. Circuit Court of Appeals, First Circuit. April 29, 1946.

Submitted to MAGRUDER, MAHONEY, and WOODBURY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

After hearing on application- for stay of proposed sale of stock of Eastern Racing Association, Inc, pending appeals by Frank Bailey et al, appellants, against Securities and Exchange Commission et al, the following order of court was entered:

It is ordered that the motion for leave to file a petition for a writ of mandamus be, and the same hereby is, denied.
